Hempstead.Denton House (New Hyde Park, New York):
Not to be confused with the George W. Denton House in Flowerhill, also part of Nassau County, New York.

The Denton House is a historic building in New Hyde Park, New York, within the Town of North Hempstead. Built in 1795 as a farmhouse, it was converted in the 1860s to a Georgian-style mansion.
